biocontainers.name: kofamscan
biocontainers.summary: KofamKOALA assigns K numbers to the user's sequence data by HMMER/HMMSEARCH against KOfam

biotools.summary: KofamScan is a gene function annotation tool based on KEGG Orthology and hidden Markov model. You need KOfam database to use this tool.
